Description: Frame 1; 6 fragments. Joined with EA 10435. Literary manuscript containing the Teaching of Ptahhotep in vertical lines on the recto and various administrative documents in horizontal lines on the verso.
Curator's comments: Part of 1863,0229.3 The literary text of this manuscript is available on T.L.A. (http://aaew.bbaw.de/tla/) Bibliography: F. Hagen, An Ancient Egyptian Literary Text in Context; The Instruction of Ptahhotep (OLA 218; Leuven; Peeters), 2012, 131-42. To be published in catalogue.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (381274) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/381274)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: fragmentary Black ink Displayed in Room 62 until 1997 Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: magic tape Binding: copydex self adhesive carpet tape Object Priority: A Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: A
